name: Fiesta (itch)
description:
You can play many different minigames from different genres with your friends or with AIs

Please Note
  • The game can be a bit buggy in the browser
  • I strongly recommend playing with a friend as the game is designed for multiplayer
Controls
  • You can choose between "WASD" and "Arrow keys"
Minigames
  • Football
  • Parkour
  • Kick-off
Upcoming Update (Sometime after the Jam)
  • Your feedback
  • Mobile support
  • More minigames
  • More character
  • Multiplayer across multiple devices
  • Existing minigames will be improved
  • Multiple game modes
  • Minigame Creator
  • Bigger town
  • More control options
  • Cosmetics

If you don't want to miss the update, feel free to follow me

Feedback or Ideas?

You can write all your feedback and ideas in the comments :)

Font used: https://www.1001fonts.com/yoster-island-font.html [ codeman38 | cody@zone38.net | http://www.zone38.net/ ]

https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto

All 1.0 assets were made within the 48 hour timeline 

1.0  was made within 48 hours for "Mix and Game Jam 2020 - Mixing Genres"
